preqs: ATS2902This unit is only available to students enrolled in a Bachelor of Music single or double degree.

rules.ruleString: Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ATS2902}

description: The unit examines issues associated with the arrangement, score preparation and orchestration of works from Western art music canon. Using notation software, students learn to orchestrate excerpts from select works. In-class performance workshops provide students with practical experience and feedback.
